@description.name: @description
@description.body:

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The class is responsible for device detection. This is specially useful if you are on a mobile device. This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maps user agent names to device IDs

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the name of the current device if detectable. It falls back to pc if the detection for other devices fails.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The string of the device found.
@return.description: The string of the device found.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Determines on what type of device the application is running. Valid values are: "mobile", "tablet" or "desktop".

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The device type name of determined device.
@return.description: The device type name of determined device.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects the device type, based on given userAgentString.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: userAgentString {String} userAgent parameter, needed for decision.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The device type name of determined device: "mobile","desktop","tablet"
@return.description: The device type name of determined device: "mobile","desktop","tablet"

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects if a device is a mobile phone. (Tablets excluded.)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: userAgentString {String} userAgent parameter, needed for decision.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Flag which indicates whether it is a mobile device.
@return.description: Flag which indicates whether it is a mobile device.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects if a device is a tablet device.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: userAgentString {String} userAgent parameter, needed for decision.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Flag which indicates whether it is a tablet device.
@return.description: Flag which indicates whether it is a tablet device.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects the device's pixel ratio. Returns 1 if detection is not possible.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Detects if either touch events or pointer events are supported. Additionally it checks if touch is enabled for pointer events.
